name: BLOODY MIRROR˟
description:
˟Blinded by diamonds I think that in reality you never attend to me, I don't cry because my tears are dried by the wind, 
I don't cry because in the emptiness the voice doesn't travel, I don't fall because gravity ignores me, I don't see because I left me blind.
wrapped in a layer of glass I see my life surrounding me, life can't be more interesting, it lifts you up and pulls you down 
only for you to realize that all that is irrelevant when gravity doesn't exist.
one thing always leads to another and today I am taken by my subconscious on a journey through my moments, a mental limbo 
that sparkles like diamonds, diamonds that used to surround my neck now surround my life, or what's left of it.
nothing more than that, small fractions of what was once great, a set of things I dreamed of 
now become part of a dream I can't wake up from, or don't want to.
small plot twist, where the flowers disappear from the spectrum leaving me in an emptiness, an emptiness full of diamonds.
i don't see the sun, which should be the fault of my bewilderment, although rays flash, i'm still tied to the blood of the human being, 
my new impediment to transcend and leave...
˟˟˟˟˟
